moonpay.infoText: Buy APT using Visa, Mastercard, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or Samsung Pay. Funds will be added to your Petra Wallet.

receive.title: Receive
receive.description: Share your account address with someone in order to receive assets from them.

noCoinsYet.title: No Coins Yet
noCoinsYet.subtext: All of your coins will show up here.

noNames.heading: No Names Yet
noNames.subtext: All of your Names will show up here.

noNfts.heading: No NFTs Yet
noNfts.subtext: All of your NFTs will show up here.

pendingReceived.heading: No NFT Offers Received Yet
pendingReceived.subtext: If someone offers to send you a NFT, it will show up here and you can choose to Accept or Decline it.

pendingSent.heading: No NFT Offers Sent Yet
pendingSent.subtext: You can choose to send a NFT as an Offer. The recipient will need to Accept it in order to add it to their wallet.

firstTimeBanner.title: Stake to receive up to 7% in rewards

cancelTransaction.title: Cancel Transaction?
cancelTransaction.subtext: Canceling the transaction will abort progress and return you to the home screen.

sendFlow.noAvailableCoinsSubtext: You can only send coins that you have in your account.
sendFlow.noMatchingCoinsSubtext: Please try with a different query
sendFlow.noAccountSubtext: Please try with a different query
sendFlow.noRecentContactsSubtext: Suggestions will show up after interacting with other accounts

transactionDetails.networkFeeInfo: A network fee is the additional cost for a transaction to process.
transactionDetails.totalCostInfo: The total cost is the transaction amount plus the network fee.

explore.typeToSearch: Start typing to search for apps...
